#summary ChangeLog

= Introduction =
FindTBB does not have releases, but instead can be obtained directly from SVN.
Consequently, instead of version numbers, revision numbers are referenced here.

= Changes =
r17: Added support for TBB 3.0 (thanks to Florian Uhlig)

r15: Added support for the environment variable TBB_ARCH_PLATFORM

r2: Initial version
